quote: I'm writing a book. I've got the page numbers done.
author: Steven Wright

quote: Writing is 1% inspiration, and 99% not being distracted by the internet.
author: Anonymous

quote: My characters always seem to know what they're doing. It's me who needs help.
author: Anonymous

quote: Writer's block is when your imaginary friends stop talking to you.
author: Anonymous

quote: I love being a writer. What I can't stand is the paperwork.
author: Peter De Vries

quote: The best time to plan a book is while you're doing the dishes.
author: Agatha Christie

quote: I only write when I'm inspired. So I see to it that I'm inspired every morning at nine o'clock.
author: Peter De Vries

quote: Writing is like driving at night in the fog. You can only see as far as your headlights, but you can make the whole trip that way.
author: E.L. Doctorow

quote: Being a writer is like having homework every night for the rest of your life.
author: Lawrence Kasdan

quote: Writing is a socially acceptable form of lying.
author: Diana Black

quote: Write drunk, edit sober.
author: Ernest Hemingway (allegedly)

quote: Writing a novel is like herding cats blindfolded through a thunderstorm.
author: Anonymous

quote: The pen is mightier than the sword, and considerably easier to write with.
author: Marty Feldman

quote: Some editors are failed writers, but so are most writers.
author: T.S. Eliot

quote: I'm not a writer. I just play one on Twitter.
author: Anonymous

quote: I write because punching people is frowned upon.
author: Anonymous

quote: There's no money in poetry, but then there's no poetry in money either.
author: Robert Graves

quote: Writing: where your coffee is always cold and your ideas are always hot.
author: Anonymous

quote: To be a writer is to embrace rejection like a clingy ex.
author: Anonymous

quote: I write so I don't kill anyone. It's therapeutic.
author: Anonymous

quote: If you want to annoy a writer, ask them how the book is going.
author: Anonymous

quote: I turned procrastination into a plot device.
author: Anonymous

quote: The only thing more terrifying than writing is not writing.
author: Anonymous

quote: Writing is the art of applying the seat of the pants to the seat of the chair.
author: Mary Heaton Vorse

quote: The difference between reality and fiction? Fiction has to make sense.
author: Tom Clancy

quote: I write to give the voices in my head something to do.
author: Anonymous

quote: I put a piece of paper under my pillow, and when I could not sleep, I wrote in the dark.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: A synonym is a word you use when you can't spell the other one.
author: Baltasar Gracin (loosely attributed)

quote: Plot twist: the author has no idea what happens next either.
author: Anonymous

quote: Writing: the art of convincing yourself your terrible ideas are great-at least until the second draft.
author: Anonymous

quote: I write because therapy is expensive.
author: Anonymous

quote: The best thing about writing fiction is that you can make up everything except the grammar.
author: Anonymous

quote: My muse is caffeine and mild panic.
author: Anonymous

quote: Why yes, I do have a love-hate relationship with my manuscript.
author: Anonymous

quote: Sometimes I write better than I talk. Other times I neither write nor talk well.
author: Anonymous

quote: 'Said' is not dead. It's just napping politely.
author: Anonymous

quote: Writing a book is like running a marathon... that you forgot you signed up for... uphill... in the rain.
author: Anonymous

quote: If procrastination were an Olympic sport, writers would medal every time.
author: Anonymous

quote: My writing process is 90% staring into the void and 10% backspacing.
author: Anonymous

quote: I opened a Word document. That's basically writing, right?
author: Anonymous

quote: If at first you don't succeed, plot twist.
author: Anonymous

quote: Writing tip: chocolate counts as motivation.
author: Anonymous

quote: Yes, I talk to myself. No, I'm not alone. My characters are here.
author: Anonymous

quote: I write because punching paper is more productive than punching people.
author: Anonymous

quote: Don't judge a writer by their search history.
author: Anonymous

quote: I was going to write today, but then I thought about it really hard instead.
author: Anonymous

quote: I don't always write, but when I do, I rewrite it ten times.
author: Anonymous

quote: Writing is a lot like daydreaming, but with more guilt.
author: Anonymous

quote: Book titles I considered before settling on 'Untitled Draft 43'.
author: Anonymous

quote: Writer's diet: coffee, sarcasm, and deadlines.
author: Anonymous

quote: I suffer from WRD: Writing-Related Delirium.
author: Anonymous

quote: I never finish a sentence without... oh look, a snack.
author: Anonymous

quote: Writing is rewriting is rewriting is crying.
author: Anonymous

quote: Some days I amaze myself. Other days I rewrite one sentence for six hours.
author: Anonymous

quote: Who needs sleep when you can stare at a blinking cursor instead?
author: Anonymous

quote: Writers are just plot holes wrapped in anxiety.
author: Anonymous

quote: What do you mean this character can't just 'disappear'?
author: Anonymous

quote: Editing: because you didn't cry enough during writing.
author: Anonymous

quote: The first draft is just you explaining the idea to yourself. Badly.
author: Anonymous

quote: I didn't choose the writing life. It chose me, then ghosted me for weeks.
author: Anonymous

quote: It's not procrastination, it's pre-plot contemplation.
author: Anonymous

quote: Writers: the only people who can get lost in a world they made up.
author: Anonymous

quote: I write because otherwise my head would explode from overplotting.
author: Anonymous

quote: Characters are like cats. You think you own them, but they do what they want.
author: Anonymous

quote: I write fiction. That means I lie for fun and call it art.
author: Anonymous

quote: Every time someone uses 'your' instead of 'you're', a writer gets indigestion.
author: Anonymous

quote: I write like no one's reading. Which is often true.
author: Anonymous

quote: My plot holes are big enough to drive an existential crisis through.
author: Anonymous

quote: The delete key is my most trusted co-author.
author: Anonymous

quote: I only write in two moods: genius and garbage fire.
author: Anonymous

quote: I plan my books like I plan my life: chaotically and with snacks.
author: Anonymous

quote: Writing tip: dialogue tags are like spices-use wisely or everyone suffers.
author: Anonymous

quote: They say write what you know. I write confused characters in weird situations.
author: Anonymous

quote: Writing: turning caffeine into questionable plot twists since forever.
author: Anonymous

quote: You can't wait for inspiration. You have to go after it with a club.
author: Jack London

quote: The road to hell is paved with works-in-progress.
author: Philip Roth

quote: I'm not a very good writer, but I'm an excellent rewriter.
author: James Michener

quote: There's nothing to writing. All you do is sit down at a typewriter and bleed.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: Writing is the only profession where no one considers you ridiculous if you earn no money.
author: Jules Renard

quote: Writing is a delicious agony.
author: Gwendolyn Brooks

quote: The most beautiful things are those that madness prompts and reason writes.
author: Andr Gide

quote: A writer is someone who can make a riddle out of an answer.
author: Karl Kraus

quote: The first draft of anything is shit.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: It took me fifteen years to discover I had no talent for writing, but I couldn't give it up because by then I was too famous.
author: Robert Benchley

quote: A writer is a person for whom writing is more difficult than it is for other people.
author: Thomas Mann

quote: The greatest part of a writer's time is spent in reading; in order to write, a man will turn over half a library to make one book.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: A good novel tells us the truth about its hero; but a bad novel tells us the truth about its author.
author: G.K. Chesterton

quote: One day I will find the right words, and they all will be simple.
author: Jack Kerouac

quote: The task of a writer consists of being able to make something out of an idea.
author: Thomas Mann

quote: Words are, of course, the most powerful drug used by mankind.
author: Rudyard Kipling

quote: I hate writing, I love having written.
author: Dorothy Parker

quote: I always start writing with a clean piece of paper and a dirty mind.
author: Patrick Dennis

quote: When I write, I feel like an armless, legless man with a crayon in his mouth.
author: Kurt Vonnegut

quote: Literature is strewn with the wreckage of those who have minded beyond reason the opinion of others.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: Being a writer is like having homework every night for the rest of your life.
author: Lawrence Kasdan

quote: I'm writing a book. I've got the page numbers done.
author: Steven Wright

quote: Cut out all those exclamation marks. An exclamation mark is like laughing at your own joke.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quote: The difference between fiction and reality? Fiction has to make sense.
author: Tom Clancy

quote: Writing is not necessarily something to be ashamed of, but do it in private and wash your hands afterwards.
author: Robert A. Heinlein
